Container.Name: BarracudaDrive
Container.Description: BarracudaDrive transforms your computer (or device) into a powerful and secure online storage system, letting you access and share files from any connected computer or device in the world. [br][br][b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/home/nobody[/b] : Folder where BarracudaDrive is installed and configured [br] [b]80[/b] : The web-interface.
Container.Overview: BarracudaDrive transforms your computer (or device) into a powerful and secure online storage system, letting you access and share files from any connected computer or device in the world.
